Double

struct Double
  • toInt(roundRule:)

    Converts this Double to an Int. If this is not a whole number the returned value will be rounded using the roundRule (default: toNearestOrAwayFromZero Round to the closest allowed value; if two values are equally close, the one with greater magnitude is chosen.).

    Author

    Rushton Pippin

    Version

    1.0

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func toInt(roundRule rule: FloatingPointRoundingRule = .up) -> Int
    Parameters
    rule

    the FloatingPointRoundingRule in which to use to round the returned value if this value is not a whole number.
    Return Value

    Int

  • isWholeNumber()

    Returns whether or not the value of this is a whole number.

    Author

    Rushton Pippin

    Version

    1.0

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func isWholeNumber() -> Bool
    Return Value

    Bool representing whether or not this is a whole number.
